Kamala Harris did date Willie Brown: the former San Francisco Mayor and State Assembly Speaker, for a period of time between 1994 and 1995.
Willie Brown did appoint Kamala Harris t: the California Unemployment Insurance Appeals Board and the Medical Assistance Commission - during his tenure as Speaker of the California Assembly.
Although Willie Brown was technically st: he had been estranged from his wife for more than a decade.
Kamala Harris: political success and first election in 2003 were not solely achieved through her relationship with Willie Brown, as she was already working as an assistant district attorney in Alameda County before taking on the appointments.
